scripts.dev:backend+db: concurrently -n DB,BE -c auto "npm run mongo" "npm:dev -w apps/backend"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n DB,BE,FE -c auto "npm run mongo" "npm:dev -w apps/backend" "npm:dev -w apps/frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/backend && npm run build -w apps/frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/backend && npm run lint -w apps/frontend
scripts.format: npm run format -w apps/backend && npm run format -w apps/frontend
